name: modbustcp
title: Modbus TCP Operation
description: Performs operation on a Modbus TCP server
author: Jan van der Lugt <jvanderl@outlook.com>

settings.name: server
settings.description: The Modbus Server Address and Port ([hostname]:[port])

settings.name: slaveId
settings.description: The ID for that identifies your flogo app as Modbus Slave

input.name: address
input.description: The address where to perform the operation

input.name: numElements
input.description: The number of coils/inputs/registers to be read/written

input.name: data
input.description: The data needed to perform the operation

output.name: result
output.description: The result status of the operation sending. 'OK' when successful.

output.name: data
output.description: The data returned from the operation
